name: John Lyx
reviewContent: I have had Dell forever. They are very sturdy and you can trust them. My kids dropped them several times and they keep working.

name: Acon Fer
reviewContent: I will buy their Poweredge server, but will wait for the Black Monday discount. All other computers I bought had problems, but Dell is a solid bet.

name: Mudes Tue
reviewContent: I attempted to order laptop on the dell.com website for twice. My order got canceled without any valid reason. I attempted to reach customer service twice and got froward to different phone number and call ended after hour long wait. Attempted few times and same result.

name: Adam Hyk
reviewContent: Wow! The worst most frustrating company I have ever dealt with! Bought a new Inspiron 15 on 26/8/21. Within 7 days the laptop started playing up; Windows search bar disabled, screen frozen etc. Spent 6 hours with tech support trying to fix it.

name: Operis Suci
reviewContent: It is horrible. The worst computer I have ever owned. I would not recommend this piece of junk to anyone! It huffs and puffs worse than a COPD patient, freeze, and is just a pain to use. Don't ever buy one. It is a waste of your money!

name: Asif Al Azad
reviewContent: Because I wanted a different security system they shut my laptop off. I will never give them another dollar. Their techs loaded the laptop with so much unnecessary programs at the register that it takes 10 min to open. Bad bad bad in my opinion. I should be able to use any security company without Dell shutting it down.
